ARABIC: قَالَ يَٰقَوْمِ إِنِّى لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My people, I am a clear warner to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He said: "O my people, I warn you clearly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Noah said: “My people, I have certainly been sent as a clear warner to you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Noah said, "My people, I am warning you plainly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “O my people! I am indeed a Herald of clear warnings to you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "O my people! Verily, I am a plain warner to you,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: O my people! Surely I am a plain warner to you:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'O my people, I am unto you a clear warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: O my people! Lo! I am a plain warner unto you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: [Noah] said, "My people! I am but a plain warner to you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: O my people! verily I am Unto you a warner manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘O my people! Indeed, I am a manifest warner to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "O my People! I am to you a Warner, clear and open:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "O my people! Verily, I am a plain warner to you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'My nation, I am a clear warner for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “O my people, I am to you a clear warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:2] He said, ‘O my people, I am indeed a plain warner to you, one whose warning is plain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: my people! Lo! I am a plain warner unto you) I am a warning messenger unto you, addressing you in a language you understand.
